mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dm_room ( room_name, room_code, room_principal, status ) VALUES ( #{roomName}, #{roomCode}, #{roomPrincipal}, 2 )
mapper.select:
SELECT id id,room_name roomName,room_code roomCode,room_principal roomPrincipal,status status FROM dm_room
1 = 1
and room_name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%')
and room_code like concat('%',#{params.code},'%')
and room_principal like concat('%',#{params.principal},'%')
and id not in(select room_id from dm_user_room where user_id = #{params.userId})
order by id,status

SELECT id id,room_name roomName,room_code roomCode,room_principal roomPrincipal,status status FROM dm_room
1 = 1
and room_name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%')
and room_code like concat('%',#{params.code},'%')
and room_principal like concat('%',#{params.principal},'%')
and id in(select room_id from dm_user_room where user_id = #{params.userId} and activate = 1)
order by id,status

SELECT r.id id,room_name roomName,room_code roomCode,room_principal roomPrincipal,status status,activate FROM dm_room r,dm_user_room u
1 = 1
and room_name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%')
and room_code like concat('%',#{params.code},'%')
and room_principal like concat('%',#{params.principal},'%')
and r.id in(select room_id from dm_user_room where user_id = #{params.userId})
and r.id = u.room_id
order by activate desc ,r.id

SELECT id id,room_name roomName,room_code roomCode,room_principal roomPrincipal,status status FROM dm_room
1 = 1 and id in (select room_id from dm_user_room where user_id = #{id} and activate = 0)
order by id,status

SELECT r.id id,room_name roomName,room_code roomCode,u.id userId,username userName,account userAccount FROM dm_room r,dm_user u
1 = 1 and r.id in(select room_id from dm_user_room where activate = 1) and u.id in(select user_id from dm_user_room where activate = 1)

SELECT id id,room_name roomName,room_code roomCode,room_principal roomPrincipal,status status FROM dm_room
id = #{id}
